panels.description: Checks the last 30mins all flow steps and returns NOT if any step FAILED. SKIPPED will return OK.

targets.query: SELECT count("duration") as "Count" FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01' AND ("result" = 'FAIL' )) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Status

targets.query: SELECT sum("duration")/1000 FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("duration") FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count("duration") as "Check" FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01' AND result = 'PASS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("duration") as "Count" FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY result
SELECT count("duration") FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("result" = 'PASS' AND "testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01' AND "name" = 'doStep08') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("duration") FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("result" = 'PASS' AND "testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01' AND "name" = 'doStep08') AND $timeFilter

panels.content: <font size=1pt>OK means did not FAIL. Skipped is also OK.</font>

options.content: <font size=1pt>OK means last 3x test PASSED. NOK means one of last 3x tests FAILED or SKIPPED</font>

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "testmethod" WHERE ("result" = 'FAIL' AND "testclass" = 'portalcheck.Trello_Flow01') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
